description: Nice hike with different terrain - Woodland , Lakes marsh, This is a geologically interesting site. This is located in a bird sanctuary many species of maritime birds nesting here.
directions: Once in Nova Scotia Canada  Fllow Highway 104 (Trans Canada 2) towrds Amherst . After Amhest follow highway 104 towards New Brunswick (travelling north) .Take exit no 3. Turn left at ramp and follow the country road towards amherst point . The trail head is about 2.5 Km from the exiton the left side . It has sign saying Amherst Point Bird sanctuary. Park the car and enjoy the hike
title: Amherst point
